segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center of the kitchen, where a boy is on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's climbing, reaching for an open cabinet above the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside the cabinet, I can clearly see a large jar labeled 'COOKIE JAR.'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yes, it's filled with cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's already got one hand inside the jar, grabbing them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, maybe to catch them or as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry it might tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the lure of those cookies seems to outweigh the danger for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to cheer him on, despite the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies must be delicious to warrant such an effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a bold move for a little one.
segments.speaker: PAR
